description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，蒋介石嫡系重要将领，抗日名将，黄埔军校第一期毕业。曾任第十一集团军总司令等职。1949年在国共内战中被俘，1959年获特赦。晚年移居美国，致力于中国和平统一。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Republic of China Army, a key general loyal to Chiang Kai-shek, a famous anti-Japanese war hero, and a graduate of the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy. He served as the commander of the 11th Army Group. He was captured in the Chinese Civil War in 1949 and was granted amnesty in 1959. In his later years, he moved to the United States and dedicated himself to the peaceful reunification of China.

description.zh-cn: 宋希濂的第一任妻子，曾任南京中央大学音乐系及金陵女子学院教师。
description.en: Song Xilian's first wife, a former teacher at the Music Department of National Central University and Ginling Women's College in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 储安平的前妻，后成为宋希濂的第二任妻子。
description.en: The ex-wife of Chu Anping, who later became Song Xilian's second wife.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军军官学校，位于广州，培养了大量军事人才。
description.en: The Republic of China Military Academy, located in Guangzhou, which trained a large number of military talents.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本千叶的军事院校，宋希濂曾在此就读。
description.en: A military academy in Chiba, Japan, where Song Xilian studied.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的高等军事学府。
description.en: A higher military institution during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，黄埔军校第一期毕业，宋希濂的同乡和同学，介绍宋希濂加入中国共产党。
description.en: A general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, a graduate of the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy, a fellow townsman and classmate of Song Xilian, who introduced Song to the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创建政党，曾为中国的执政党。
description.en: The founding party of the Republic of China, formerly the ruling party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1926年发生于广州的政治事件，导致国共合作关系出现裂痕，宋希濂因此事件脱离中国共产党。
description.en: A political incident in Guangzhou in 1926 that caused a rift in the KMT-CPC cooperation, leading Song Xilian to leave the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，曾任黄埔军校校长、国民政府主席、中华民国总统。宋希濂是其嫡系将领。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader who served as the Commandant of the Whampoa Military Academy, Chairman of the Nationalist Government, and President of the Republic of China. Song Xilian was one of his loyal generals.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一，1935年被国民党逮捕，后在福建长汀被宋希濂奉命枪决。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party, arrested by the KMT in 1935 and later executed by order in Changting, Fujian, by Song Xilian's troops.

description.zh-cn: 由国民革命军第十九路军于1933年在福建发动的反蒋事变中成立的政权，后被中央军镇压。
description.en: A government established by the 19th Route Army of the National Revolutionary Army during an anti-Chiang incident in Fujian in 1933, which was later suppressed by the Central Army.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战末期，中国人民解放军在西南地区对中华民国国军发起的大规模战役，宋希濂在此战役中被俘。
description.en: A large-scale campaign launched by the People's Liberation Army against the Republic of China Armed Forces in Southwest China at the end of the Second Chinese Civil War, during which Song Xilian was captured.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式，是中国政治生活中的一项重要机构。
description.en: The organizational form of the Chinese People's Patriotic United Front, an important institution in China's political life.

description.zh-cn: 由黄埔军校校友组成的组织，宋希濂曾任副会长。
description.en: An organization composed of alumni of the Whampoa Military Academy, where Song Xilian served as vice president.

description.zh-cn: 马英九的外祖父，抗战时期曾任宋希濂的机要处长。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou's maternal grandfather, who served as Song Xilian's confidential section chief during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军上将，后在长沙起义加入中国人民解放军。曾电邀宋希濂共同起义但被拒绝。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Army who later joined the People's Liberation Army after the Changsha uprising. He once invited Song Xilian to join the uprising but was rejected.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，时任第五兵团司令员，其部队在西南战役中俘虏了宋希濂。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, then commander of the 5th Army Group, whose troops captured Song Xilian during the Southwest Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国知识分子，曾任《光明日报》总编辑，在反右运动中被打为右派。其前妻为易吟先。
description.en: A Chinese intellectual, former editor-in-chief of Guangming Daily, who was labeled a rightist during the Anti-Rightist Campaign. His ex-wife was Yi Yinxian.

description.zh-cn: 宋希濂与储安平当时的妻子易吟先有染，后易吟先与储安平离婚并与宋希濂结婚。
description.en: Song Xilian had an affair with Chu Anping's then-wife Yi Yinxian, who later divorced Chu and married Song.

description.zh-cn: 考入黄埔军校第一期，成为最年轻的毕业生之一。
description.en: Enrolled in the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy, becoming one of its youngest graduates.

description.zh-cn: 被保送至日本千叶陆军步兵学校中国学生队就读。
description.en: Was sent to study in the Chinese student corps at the Army Infantry School in Chiba, Japan.

description.zh-cn: 入读陆军大学将官班甲级第一期。
description.en: Enrolled in the first Class-A general officers course at the Army University.

description.zh-cn: 经陈赓介绍，宋希濂加入中国共产党。
description.en: Through Chen Geng's introduction, Song Xilian joined the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中山舰事件后，宋希濂脱离中国共产党。
description.en: After the Zhongshan Warship Incident, Song Xilian left the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 宋希濂是蒋介石的嫡系重要将领，长期在其麾下任职。
description.en: Song Xilian was a key general loyal to Chiang Kai-shek and served under his command for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 下达“着将瞿秋白就地处决具报”的命令给宋希濂。
description.en: Issued an order to Song Xilian to 'execute Qu Qiubai on the spot and report back'.

description.zh-cn: 奉蒋介石之命，将瞿秋白枪决。
description.en: Under Chiang Kai-shek's orders, he executed Qu Qiubai by firing squad.

description.zh-cn: 率领第36师参与镇压由十九路军成立的福建人民政府。
description.en: Led the 36th Division to participate in the suppression of the Fujian People's Government established by the 19th Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 宋希濂在西南战役中兵败，于四川峨边县被中国人民解放军俘虏。
description.en: Song Xilian was defeated in the Southwest Campaign and captured by the People's Liberation Army in Ebian County, Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国人民解放军第五兵团司令员，其部队俘虏了宋希濂。
description.en: As the commander of the PLA's 5th Army Group, his troops captured Song Xilian.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

position.en: Commissioner for Historical and Cultural Materials, Standing Committee Member

description.zh-cn: 1959年获特赦后，先后担任全国政协文史专员和常务委员。
description.en: After being granted amnesty in 1959, he served as a Commissioner for Historical and Cultural Materials and a Standing Committee Member of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期，秦承志曾担任宋希濂的机要处长。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Qin Chengzhi served as Song Xilian's confidential section chief.

description.zh-cn: 陈明仁在长沙起义后，致电宋希濂，邀请其共同起义。
description.en: After the Changsha Uprising, Chen Mingren telegraphed Song Xilian, inviting him to join the uprising.

description.zh-cn: 宋希濂以“事关甚大，正在慎重研究中”为由，拒绝了陈明仁的起义邀请。
description.en: Song Xilian rejected Chen Mingren's invitation to defect, stating that 'the matter is of great importance and is under careful consideration'.
